summary: AN ORDINANCE revising the 1997 annual budget by decreasing certain expenditure allowances and increasing certain other expenditure allowances in the 1997 budgets of various City departments and agencies from various City funds to provide for various costs and expenses not provided for in the 1997 Budget by appropriation, reappropriation and transfer from various City funds including the Emergency Subfund, Reserve for Technology Fund, Seattle Financial Management System Redevelopment Fund; and creating a new Key Arena Renovation Fund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
